roleset.name: wise
roleset.note: PRUDENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on Medi-seed corpus. Comparison to 'wise.01' (from prudent.01-j)

example.name: arg1 and PRP
example.text: However , an excision of the area would be prudent to exclude significant pathology in adjacent areas .
example.arg: to exclude significant pathology in adjacent areas

example.name: concatenation of arg1
example.text: He was very uncertain of this beautiful woman who was to be his wife, but he was prudent to keep such thoughts to himself.
